get_dsl_content(dsl_path, helmtype)¶

Read content from different Helm input types

Parameters

dsl_path (str) – filesystem path to the Helm resource

Raises

NotImplementedError – raised if current config is not supported

Returns

content of given DSL resource

Return type

str

template_chart_archive(helm_path)¶

Templates given Helm chart to YAML

Parameters

helm_path (str) – filesystem path to the helm chart or archive

Raises

  • FileTypeNotSupported – raised if filetype found at path not supported

  • ImporterError – raised if helm tamplate had an error, most likely due to error in given chart

Returns

templated yaml definition

Return type

str
